title: The Discovery of Sleepwalking and Clairvoyance During Mesmerism
first_phrase: This text explores the discovery of somnambulism and its relationship with mesmerism. It tells the story of how a young girl with severe toothache was healed after just a few minutes of mesmerization, giving confidence to Mesmer's followers. The author goes on to recount the experiences of M. de Puységur, who was able to cure a young peasant boy's chest infection using mesmeric techniques, leading to the discovery of somnambulism. In the last 200 tokens, the article emphasizes the relationship between the magnetic agent of Mesmer and the state of somnambulism, which can be used to heal diseases. The text is rich in historical names and concepts, such as the theory of mesmerism and the benefits of somnambulism.
content: Quelle fut sa surprise de voir, après quelques minutes de magnétisation, le jeune homme tomber dans un profond sommeil, sans convulsions ni douleurs! M. de Puységur lui parle, et bien qu’endormi, les yeux fermés, le malade répond et se fait médecin. Avec une précision remarquable, il indique le siège, la cause du mal et le remède qu’il faut appliquer. Son ordonnance est aussitôt suivie de point en point et le malade est guéri. Le somnambulisme est découvert. Il est désormais reconnu que l’agent magnétique de Mesmer, indépendamment de son action curative à l’état de veille, provoque souvent un sommeil pendant lequel les facultés humaines surexcitées peuvent être spécialement employées, comme le mesmérisme ordinaire, à la guérison des maladies.
last_phrase: In conclusion, the discovery of the phenomenon of somnambulism through magnetism was a groundbreaking moment in medical history. The ability to access the heightened faculties of the human mind while in a sleep-like state opened up new possibilities for healing. It is a testament to the power of human curiosity and perseverance in uncovering the mysteries of the mind and body.
